metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20053 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the canUnpack function in p_mach.cpp in UPX 3.95 via a crafted Mach-O file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20053` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

upx-ucl - 3.96-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.96-2').
